scripts.vpc-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/vpc.ts" deploy VpcStack -c @aws-cdk/core:newStyleStackSynthesis=true --profile produser
scripts.aurora-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/aurora.ts" deploy AuroraStack -c @aws-cdk/core:newStyleStackSynthesis=true --profile produser
scripts.bastion-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/bastion.ts" deploy BastionStack -c @aws-cdk/core:newStyleStackSynthesis=true --profile produser
scripts.prelambda-deploy: npm run createLayer && npm run copyData
scripts.lambda-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/lambda.ts" deploy PrivateLambdaStack -c @aws-cdk/core:newStyleStackSynthesis=true --profile produser
scripts.create-layer-for-lambda-with-cognito-dep: ts-node lib/process/preForCognitoLambda.ts && cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/lambda-layer-for-cognito-deploy.ts" deploy  -c @aws-cdk/core:newStyleStackSynthesis=true --profile produser
scripts.vpc-test-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/vpc-route-test.ts" destroy VpcRouteTestStack  --profile produser
scripts.cloudfront-s3-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/cloudfront.ts" deploy AWSCloudFrontStack --profile produser
scripts.cloudfront-client-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/cloudfront-client-deploy.ts" deploy AWSCloudFrontClientDeployStack --profile produser
scripts.log-retention-deploy: cdk -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/log-retention.ts" deploy LogS3FireHoseStack   --profile produser
scripts._postlog-retention-deploy: aws logs describe-log-groups --log-group-name-prefix /aws/lambda/hello --query "logGroups[?retentionInDays==null]" | jq -r ".[].logGroupName" | sed "s/^ *\| *$//"  | xargs -IVAR_LOG_GROUP_NAME aws logs put-retention-policy --log-group-name VAR_LOG_GROUP_NAME --retention-in-days 60
